text: melum, (muhminkalakiya) avarkal ullankalukkitaiyil (anpin) pinaippai untakkinan; pumiyilulla (celvankal) anaittaiyum nir celavu ceyta potilum, avarkal ullankalukkitaiye attakaiya (anpin) pinaippai untakkiyirukka mutiyatu - anal niccayamaka allah avarkalitaiye appinaippai erpatuttiyullan; meyyakave avan mikaittavanakavum, nanamullavanakavum irukkinran
